name: Speedy Gonzales: Los Gatos Bandidos
overview: Why Do You Think They Call Him Speedy? Speedy Gonzales, the "Fastest Mouse in all of Mexico" has his hands full in this runaway action-adventure game! The evil "Los Gatos Bandidos" have captured all of Speedy's mice friends and now it's up to him to save them! Travel across the globe and beyond on a rescue mission for the missing mice. Speedy's super speed comes in handy while facing a variety of nasties from Robocat to his old nemesis, Sylvester the Gato!
